typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	joinfield as string
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dynaSource
dynaSource derive(joinfield = toInteger(byName($joinfield))) ~> lookupPK
MoviesSource, lookupPK join(movie == joinfield,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
